title: Acces To Login Queue Issues
body:
Hi guys, i have an issue for joining the Loging Queue... Is it because there is so many people trying to connect in a same time ? or it's about something else ? 
Thanks in advance for your help ;) 

Best Regard.

DarkZiriel

replies.body: Thanks for the report!  There were login issues overnight, but everything should be back to normal!
